name: Gooey Lobster Mac and Cheese
author: laujm2
summary: Super cheesy and super gooey! A smooth creamy blend of Swiss and sharp Cheddar with the sweetness of lobster. Side dish for many, or a main course for about 10 people, give or take. A great guilty pleasure!
ingredients: 2 (8 ounce) packages shredded Swiss cheese, divided
2 (8 ounce) packages shredded sharp Cheddar cheese, divided
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook cavatappi in the boiling water, stirring occasionally, until tender yet firm to the bite, about 12 minutes
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Melt butter in a saucepan over medium-low heat
Stir in flour until a paste forms, about 2 minutes
Stir in heavy cream slowly; cook until heated through, 3 to 5 minutes
Add 1 package Swiss cheese and 1 package Cheddar cheese; stir until melted, about 2 minutes
Season sauce with nutmeg, salt, and pepper
Combine cooked pasta, sauce, lobster, and lobster cooking liquid in a large bowl
Stir in half of the remaining Swiss cheese and Cheddar cheese
Sprinkle remaining Swiss cheese and Cheddar cheese on top
Bake in the preheated oven until cheeses are melted and bubbly, 20 to 30 minutes
